member.name: IOleControl.FreezeEvents
member.summary: Indicates whether the container is ignoring or accepting events from the control.
member.param: Indicates whether the container will ignore (TRUE) or now process (FALSE) events from the control.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK in all cases.

member.name: IOleControl.GetControlInfo
member.summary: Retrieves information about the control's keyboard mnemonics and behavior.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the information.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return value E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The address in pCI is not valid. For example, it may be NULL.

member.name: IOleControl.OnAmbientPropertyChange
member.summary: Informs a control that one or more of the container's ambient properties has changed.
member.param: The dispatch identifier of the ambient property that changed. If this parameter is DISPID_UNKNOWN, it indicates that multiple properties changed. In this case, the control should check all the ambient properties of interest to obtain their current values.
member.returns: This method returns S_OK in all cases.

member.name: IOleControl.OnMnemonic
member.summary: Informs a control that the user has pressed a keystroke that represents a keyboard mnemonic.
member.param: A pointer to the structure describing the keystroke to be processed.

returns.para: This method can return the standard return values E_INVALIDARG and E_UNEXPECTED, as well as the following values.

listheader.description: The control does not handle mnemonics. This indicates an unexpected condition and a caller error. For example, the caller has mismatched which control has which mnemonic.

member.name: IOleControl
member.summary: Provides the features for supporting keyboard mnemonics, ambient properties, and events in control objects.
